page.title: 13BOTO-X 1985 (3)
page.content: climb the higher banks down which the other half of the team had slithered! We were fortunate that the boat had a rope by which we could haul it up these difficult slopes. The boats stood up well to the battering they received unlike their crews who suffered a variety of injuries. These ranged from nettle stings and minor cuts to a broken arm and two cases of hypothermia. My team reached the semi-finals. We felt that we were unlucky not to reach the final, but we were disqualified because a crew member fell out of the boat!
